00069     {}

00071     MetaCode::MetaCode(const int &MetaValue_, const MetaCode::InputCode &Code_)
00072     {
00073         Construct(MetaValue_, Code_);
00074     }

00076     MetaCode::MetaCode(const RawEvent &RawEvent_)
00077     {
00078         Construct(RawEvent_);
00079     }
00080 
00081     void MetaCode::Construct(const RawEvent &RawEvent_)
00082     {
00083         Construct(BUTTON_UP, KEY_FIRST);        //create a safe but gibberish default
00084         /// @todo TODO: Actually process each event
00085         switch(RawEvent_.type)
00086         {
00087             case SDL_KEYDOWN:
00088                 Construct(BUTTON_PRESSING, GetInputCodeFromSDL_KEY(RawEvent_));
00089                 break;
00090             case SDL_KEYUP:
00091                 Construct(BUTTON_LIFTING, GetInputCodeFromSDL_KEY(RawEvent_));
00092                 break;
00093             case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN: //in some case will generate a mousewheel and a mouse button event
00094                 Construct(BUTTON_LIFTING, GetInputCodeFromSDL_MOUSE(RawEvent_));
00095                 break;
00096             case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONUP: //in some case will generate a mousewheel and a mouse button event
00097                 Construct(BUTTON_LIFTING, GetInputCodeFromSDL_MOUSE(RawEvent_));
00098                 break;
00099 
00100             case SDL_JOYAXISMOTION:/// @todo TODO determine if Joystick RawEvents will emit 1 or multiple Metacodes
00101                 break;
00102             case SDL_JOYBUTTONDOWN:
00103                 break;
00104             case SDL_JOYBUTTONUP:
00105                 break;
00106             case SDL_JOYBALLMOTION:
00107                 break;
00108             case SDL_JOYHATMOTION:
00109                 break;
00110 
00111             case SDL_MOUSEMOTION:
00112                 throw ("RawEvent which creates Multiple Metacodes inserted into Metacode");
00113                 break;
00114 
00115             default:
00116                 throw ("Unknown User Input Inserted into Metacode");
00117                 break;
00118         }
00119     }
00120 
00121     void MetaCode::Construct(const int &MetaValue_, const MetaCode::InputCode &Code_)
00122     {
00123         SetMetaValue(MetaValue_);
00124         SetCode(Code_);
00125     }

00127     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

00130 
00131     //This function assumes the RawEvent is a valid SDL Keyevent
00132     MetaCode::InputCode MetaCode::GetInputCodeFromSDL_KEY(const RawEvent &RawEvent_)
00133     {
00134         //This Whole thing will only work with SDL Keyboard events. If we switch out event subsystems this is one of those that must change it.
00135         MetaCode::InputCode To;
00136 
00137         assert( sizeof(To)==sizeof(RawEvent_.key.keysym.sym) );
00138         memcpy( &To, &(RawEvent_.key.keysym.scancode), sizeof(RawEvent_.key.keysym.scancode));
00139 
00140         return To;
00141     }
00142 
00143     MetaCode::InputCode MetaCode::GetInputCodeFromSDL_MOUSE(const RawEvent &RawEvent_)
00144     {
00145         switch (RawEvent_.button.button )
00146         {
00147             case SDL_BUTTON_LEFT: return MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON_1;
00148             case SDL_BUTTON_RIGHT: return MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON_2;
00149             case SDL_BUTTON_MIDDLE: return MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON_3;
00150             case SDL_BUTTON_X1: return MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON_4;
00151             case SDL_BUTTON_X2: return MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON_5;
00152         }
00153     }
00154 
00155     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00156     // Conversion and Casting Functions
00157     ///////////////////////////////////////
00158     MetaCode::ButtonState MetaCode::GetMetaValueAsButtonState() const
00159     {
00160         if( MetaCode::BUTTON_LIFTING <= this->MetaValue && MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN >= this->MetaValue)
00161         {
00162             return (MetaCode::ButtonState) this->MetaValue;
00163         }else{
00164             throw("Invalid ButtonState in MetaValue");
00165         }
00166     }
00167 
00168     MetaCode::DirectionalMotionState MetaCode::GetMetaValueAsDirectionalMotionState() const
00169     {
00170         if( MetaCode::DIRECTIONALMOTION_DOWNRIGHT <= this->MetaValue && MetaCode::DIRECTIONALMOTION_UPLEFT >= this->MetaValue)
00171         {
00172             return (MetaCode::DirectionalMotionState) this->MetaValue;
00173         }else{
00174             throw("Invalid DirectionalMotionState in MetaValue");
00175         }
00176     }

00181     {
00182         return this->MetaValue;

00186     {
00187         return this->Code;

00192         this->MetaValue=MetaValue_;

00196     {
00197         this->Code=Code_;

00200     void MetaCode::SetCode(int Code_)
00201     {
00202         this->Code=(MetaCode::InputCode)Code_;
00203     }

00205     MetaCode::InputCode MetaCode::GetMouseButtonCode(short unsigned int ButtonNumber)
00206     {
00207         MetaCode::InputCode Answer = (MetaCode::InputCode)(ButtonNumber + (int)MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON);
00208         if ( MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON_FIRST > Answer && MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON_LAST < Answer)
00209             { throw (Exception("Unsupported mouse Button.")); }
00210         return Answer;
00211     }
00212 
00213     MetaCode::InputCode MetaCode::GetJoystickButtonCode(short unsigned int ButtonNumber)
00214     {
00215         MetaCode::InputCode Answer = (MetaCode::InputCode)(ButtonNumber + (int)MetaCode::JOYSTICKBUTTON);
00216         if ( MetaCode::JOYSTICKBUTTON_FIRST > Answer && MetaCode::JOYSTICKBUTTON_LAST < Answer)
00217             { throw (Exception("Unsupported Joystick Button.")); }
00218         return Answer;
00219     }
00220 
00221     MetaCode::InputCode MetaCode::GetJoystickAxisCode(short unsigned int AxisNumber)
00222     {
00223         MetaCode::InputCode Answer = (MetaCode::InputCode)(AxisNumber + (int)MetaCode::JOYSTICKAXIS);
00224         if ( MetaCode::JOYSTICKAXIS_FIRST > Answer && MetaCode::JOYSTICKAXIS_LAST < Answer)
00225             { throw (Exception("Unsupported Joystick AXIS.")); }
00226         return Answer;
00227     }
00228 
00229     bool MetaCode::IsKeyboardButton() const
00230         { return (MetaCode::KEY_FIRST <= this->Code && this->Code <= MetaCode::KEY_LAST); }
00231 
00232     bool MetaCode::IsAltKey() const
00233         { return (MetaCode::KEY_LALT == this->Code || this->Code <= MetaCode::KEY_RALT); }
00234 
00235     bool MetaCode::IsCtrlKey() const
00236         { return (MetaCode::KEY_LCTRL == this->Code || this->Code <= MetaCode::KEY_RCTRL); }
00237 
00238     bool MetaCode::IsShiftKey() const
00239         { return (MetaCode::KEY_LSHIFT == this->Code || this->Code <= MetaCode::KEY_RSHIFT); }
00240 
00241     bool MetaCode::IsSuperKey() const
00242         { return (MetaCode::KEY_LSUPER == this->Code || this->Code <= MetaCode::KEY_RSUPER); }
00243 
00244     bool MetaCode::IsMouseButton() const
00245         { return (MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON_FIRST <= this->Code && this->Code <= MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON_LAST); }
00246 
00247     bool MetaCode::IsPollable() const
00248         { return ( IsKeyboardButton() || IsMouseButton() || this->Code==MetaCode::JOYSTICKBUTTON); }
00249 
00250     bool MetaCode::IsJoyStickEvent() const
00251         { return (MetaCode::JOYSTICK_FIRST <= this->Code && this->Code <= MetaCode::JOYSTICK_LAST); }
00252 
00253     bool MetaCode::IsOtherInputEvent() const
00254         { return (MetaCode::INPUTEVENT_FIRST <= this->Code && this->Code <= MetaCode::INPUTEVENT_LAST); }
00255 
00256     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00257     // Operators
00258     ///////////////////////////////////////
00259     bool MetaCode::operator==(const MetaCode &other) const
00260     {
00261         if(this->Code == other.Code && this->MetaValue == other.MetaValue)
00262         {
00263             return true;
00264         }else{
00265             return false;
00266         }
00267     }
00268 }
00269 
00270 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const phys::MetaCode& x)
00271 {
00272     stream << "<MetaCode Version=\"1\" MetaValue=\"" << x.GetMetaValue() << "\"" << " Code=\"" << x.GetCode() <<  "\" />";
00273     return stream;
00274 }
00275 
00276 #ifdef PHYSXML
00277 std::istream& PHYS_LIB operator >> (std::istream& stream, phys::MetaCode& x)
00278 {
00279     phys::String OneTag( phys::xml::GetOneTag(stream) );
00280     std::auto_ptr<phys::xml::Document> Doc( phys::xml::PreParseClassFromSingleTag("phys::", "MetaCode", OneTag) );
00281 
00282     Doc->GetFirstChild() >> x;
00283 
00284     return stream;
00285 }
00286 
00287 phys::xml::Node& operator >> (const phys::xml::Node& OneNode, phys::MetaCode& x)
00288 {
00289     if ( phys::String(OneNode.Name())==phys::String("MetaCode") )
00290     {
00291         if(OneNode.GetAttribute("Version").AsInt() == 1)
00292         {
00293             x.SetMetaValue(OneNode.GetAttribute("MetaValue").AsInt());
00294             x.SetCode(OneNode.GetAttribute("Code").AsInt());
00295         }else{
00296             throw( phys::Exception("Incompatible XML Version for MetaCode: Not Version 1"));
00297         }
00298     }else{
00299         throw( phys::Exception(phys::StringCat("Attempting to deserialize a MetaCode, found a ", OneNode.Name())));
00300     }
00301 }
00302 #endif // \PHYSXML

00304 #endif
